name: Comfy Camper
description:
A chill camping experience in the woods. Try to collect everything nature has to offer and have a good time!

This prototype was made as part of a university project by the following people:

  • Cédric Laroche
  • David Céré
  • Félix Marcoux
  • Hugo Lefebvre
  • Vincent Nadeau

All musics are royalty-free. Sound effects were taken from Freesound and sometimes slightly altered.
